titleStmt.title: Anniversaries upon his Panarete continued: With her contemplations, penned in the languishing time of her sicknesse. The second yeeres annivers.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.
Brathwait, Frances, d. 1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, and are to be sold by Robert Bostock, at the Kings Head in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "The distint [sic] titles of these contemplations. .." has separate half-title; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
